channel.title: Help making people register to play!
channel.description: Ok well ive been working on my source for a while now and i am wondering if anyone can get me a tut or write me a tut on how to make it so people cant play unless they register. any help would be much appreciated ty!

item.title: Help making people register to play!
item.dc:creator: @alysonj9 alysonj9
item.description:
@alysonj9 wrote:

Yeah i understand that, is there a tut you can give me to make my source mysql aprooved i saw that you made one with my sql. You can add my msn alysonj9@hotmail.co.uk if you want to help.

Read full topic
